txt.en:
'Well met, [placeholder]. I'm here on account of reports concerning strange creatures roaming about these parts. Presumably the creatures are off to the south and west throughout the watery regions of this area. I would like you to confirm the rumours and bring back sufficient evidence of their existence.

'If you find anything to verify my concerns, be sure to look for a suitable sample of their flesh. I have a friend who can discern the nature of these beasts by looking at their hides.

'Return to me here when you've done what I ask, and we shall proceed from there.'
'Well done, [placeholder]. May I have a look before you bring them to my friend?'
Hasta has asked you to investigate reports of strange creatures lurking in the Water-works.

The creatures under suspicion are rumoured to be found to the south and west of the Rotting Cellar.\n\nHasta has asked you to confirm the reports of strange creatures in the Water-works by bringing back sufficient evidence of their existence.
